extension.valueString:
https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxMix/ Script:
Step 1 
Create Batch text input file (b-m.txt) with following ids for Buprenorphine and Methadone ingredients: 
6813
1819
352364

Step2
Submit batch job using the above b-m.txt file to following workflow by uploading file (Ingredient-wf.config) with the following in the file: <WFE><filteredOutputs>RXCUI|name|term_type</filteredOutputs><input>NOINPUT</input><FS><service>NOINPUT</service><function>getRelatedByType</function><level>0</level><paramSize>2</paramSize><param order ='0'>?</param><param order ='1'>SBD,SCD,GPCK,BPCK</param></FS></WFE>
All prescribable Buprenorphine and Methadone medications
All prescribable Buprenorphine and Methadone medications

name: buprenorphine_and_methadone_medications
title: buprenorphine and methadone medications
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
description: All prescribable Buprenorphine and Methadone medications
purpose: Buprenorphine and Methadone medications for opioid management
